title: OPPO kicks off ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO F19 Pro, F17 Pro, Reno 4 F and more
content:
OPPO has opened up the ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO F19 Pro, OPPO F17 Pro, OPPO Reno 4 F, and OPPO Reno 5 F. OPPO previously confirmed these phones would get the beta update sometime in February, and it’s making good on its promise. According to a series of announcements on the OPPO

The post OPPO kicks off ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO F19 Pro, F17 Pro, Reno 4 F and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO has opened up the ColorOS 12 beta program for the OPPO F19 Pro, OPPO F17 Pro, OPPO Reno 4 F, and OPPO Reno 5 F.
